page.title: 19Balloon crashes in Graveyard
page.content:
"9/7/85 -There was a hot air balloon hovering in the sky.It was blue and white. It had a large advert for Alka Seltzer on the side.Helen, Karen,Sarah and I were in the wood in our camp.We also had Karen's baby sister Emma with us in her push chair. The balloon was flying very low and as I looked up I could see a little flame trying to keep the balloon up. I could see the faces of two men looking down from the basket at us. Finally the balloon had to land near the {"Elephants' Graveyard"}(A local name for a mound of stones from a disused quarry). Lots of people ran through the corn field to see the balloon. The farmer wasn't very pleased - he let out his dogs and we ran back to the woods."
By Helen Short.
